column1: '''Zaragamba''' is the actual name of the [[Hobbitish]] old family-name "[[Oldbuck Family

column2: Gorhendad]], travelled east and founded [[Buckland]] on the Shire's borders, the family name changed to ''[[Brandagamba]]''.
